content:
Yes, you can also try these yoga poses that are specifically targeted to strengthen and stretch the lower back muscles:

1. Child's Pose (Balasana) 
2. Cat-Cow (Marjaryasana-Bitilasana)
3. Cobra Pose (Bhujangasana)
4. Sphinx Pose (Salamba Bhujangasana)
5. Extended Triangle Pose (Utthita Trikonasana)
6. Standing Forward Bend (Uttanasana)
7. Wide-Angle Seated Forward Bend (Upavistha Konasana)
8. Plank Pose (Phalakasana)
9. Boat Pose (Navasana)
10. Happy Baby Pose (Ananda Balasana)

Incorporating these poses into your yoga routine will provide additional benefits to your lower back muscles and also help you to develop a strong core and flexible hamstrings. Additionally, regular practice of these poses will also help prevent lower back pain in the long run.
